definition: open to the view of all/spacious/to open wide/to disclose
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: If Exposure decreases, the Transferee is obliged to return equivalent Collateral.
sentences.chinese: 當風險敞口降低時，受讓人有責任返還相同的擔保品。

sentences.english: These glasses are usually short and broad glasses, with straight or slightly sloping sides.
sentences.chinese: 這類杯通常矮而敞口，直壁或杯壁稍傾。

sentences.english: Exposure, internal jugular reap, drum abdomen and bell shape ring foot.
sentences.chinese: 敞口，頸內收，鼓腹，下有喇叭狀圈足。

sentences.english: Strain into a large, wide bowl, and stir in the orange zest.
sentences.chinese: 倒入一個大且敞口的碗內加入橘皮。

sentences.english: Wide along the lip, exposure, intra-abdominal collection Qu, small flat-bottomed.
sentences.chinese: 寬脣沿，敞口，曲腹內收，小平底。

sentences.english: This paper presented the concept and structure of an air-charged floating vessel with open bottom.
sentences.chinese: 提出底敞口充氣浮箱的結構和概念。

sentences.english: The anterior surface of the heart demonstrates an opened left anterior descending coronary artery.
sentences.chinese: 心臟的前表面可見一敞口的冠狀動脈左前降支。

sentences.english: Open tank with or without lip.
sentences.chinese: 帶蓋或不帶蓋的敞口箱。

sentences.english: And every open vessel, which hath no covering bound upon it, is unclean.
sentences.chinese: 凡敞口的器皿，就是沒有紮上蓋的，也是不潔淨。

sentences.english: Margin payments are widely thought to cover two-thirds of total CDS exposure.
sentences.chinese: 保證金償付在CDS敞口總量中佔到三分之二。

sentences.english: Archaize bronze modelling, open, abdominal micro drum, foot outside plumper.
sentences.chinese: 仿古銅器造型，敞口，腹微鼓，足外撇。

definition: handle in the shape of a hoop
water pot or goblet (for Chinese calligraphy)
celadon, classic Chinese style of ceramic glaze
